title: Skin Stealers

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Attack a person at night, allowing you to mimic their ability the next night

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Your attacker will learn that your blood is clear if you survive the attack
-twice per game you can add red food dye to your blood, giving attackers the normal defense too high feedback
